mapper.select: SELECT user_id , user_name, userrole, juminno, orgcode FROM ( SELECT b.user_id, a.user_name, a.userrole, a.juminno, 'ORG0001' as orgcode FROM t_org0001 a, t_user b, t_user_mapping c WHERE a.juminno = b.juminno AND a.juminno = c.juminno AND a.juminno = #{juminNo} AND c.orgcode = 'ORG0001' UNION ALL SELECT b.user_id, a.user_name, a.userrole, a.juminno, 'ORG0002' as orgcode FROM t_org0002 a, t_user b, t_user_mapping c WHERE a.juminno = b.juminno AND a.juminno = c.juminno AND a.juminno = #{juminNo} AND c.orgcode = 'ORG0002' ) WHERE 1=1 AND orgcode = #{loginUserOrgCode}
SELECT user_id, user_name, juminno FROM t_user WHERE juminno = #{juminNo}
